name: Show of Horrors
description:
Game developed for the 1-Button Jam 2021. The game use only one button, the Space button.

You work on a horror park, where you must choose what kind of horror creature you want to scare your clients! In the game you're gonna scare one customer that will only get scared with some creatures, choose good creatures to achive the maximum points to win the game! 

Controls: 

You use the Space bar(only one buutton) to select the options on screens. The game change automatically the options for you, so, you only need to select them. You can only scare the customer between the curtains.

Credits:

Art, Programming, Animation an Design: Gustavo Eliseu
